abstract: Portuguese government grants dual citizenship to descendants of Sephardic Jews but only if they can prove a connection to Portuguese Sephardic Jews.
lead_paragraph: The cabinet on Thursday approved a law offering dual citizenship to the descendants of Sephardic Jews, the term commonly used for those who once lived in the Iberian Peninsula.
snippet: The cabinet on Thursday approved a law offering dual citizenship to the descendants of Sephardic Jews, the term commonly used for those who once lived in the Iberian Peninsula.

headline.main: Portugal: Welcoming Descendants of Persecuted Jews
headline.print_headline: Portugal: Welcoming Descendants of Persecuted Jews
